2. DESeq2 Analysis
```{r}
read.keep <- readCount[keep,]
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = read.keep,colData = conds, design= ~condition) 
deseq2out <- DESeq (dds)
res <- results(deseq2out)
plotMA(res)
res
```
